name: Level Shifter
description:
Made for the 2021 GMTK Game Jam: Joined Together

Level Shifter started out with me thinking "I want to make a game where you move the level around you." Gradually I started to restrict the mechanic and it slowly formed into a puzzle game.

Give it a shot and please comment your thoughts, Thank you.

Special thanks to Certicus, KRis67 and derCubyVonNebenan for play testing and me helping my find all the bugs.
